body.name: Evenflo Feeding Premium Proflo Vented Plus Polypropylene Baby, Newborn and Infant Bottles - Helps Reduce Colic - Clear, 8 Ounce (Pack of 6)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 2 hrs 17 mins
features: EASY TO HOLD - Evenflo Feeding's classic and iconic shape now has a fun, ergonomic twist! These uniquely shaped vented baby bottles are incredibly easy to hold while feeding, ensuring both you and your little one are comfortable.

PREMIUM VENTING - Evenflo Feeding's patented Proflo Venting Technology was developed to ensure milk bubbles stay in the bottle and not in your baby's tummy. This gentle, 1-piece venting system helps significantly reduce the potential for colic, reflux, gas, and fussiness, keeping your baby comfortable even after they are finished eating.

EASY TO CLEAN - Designed with only 3 pieces, the Vented Plus Baby Bottles can be easily assembled and disassembled for a quick, thorough cleaning between feedings. And because there are only a few parts, there is nothing extra to worry about misplacing. These bottles are also dishwasher safe (top rack only), making your life even easier.

PUMP DIRECTLY INTO YOUR BABY BOTTLES - Breastfeeding and pumping can be a time consuming task and as a mother you have things to do. Pumping directly into your Baby Bottles is convenient and the Evenflo Feeding baby bottles will fit onto most standard neck breast pumps.
COMMITTED - You’re committed to your child’s safety and so is Evenflo Feeding. Their baby bottles are 100% free of polycarbonates, PVC, and phthalates, and are constructed of food grade materials.
body.description: Evenflo Vented + Bottles and Proflo Vented Nipples provide a complete line of feeding solutions for your baby's changing needs. Delivering a twist on an iconic classic, The Evenflo Vented + Polypropylene Bottles feature classic styling with an ergonomic shape. These uniquely shaped are paired with patented Proflo Venting Technology. Expertly designed for easy assembly and leak-free feeding, the simple, one-piece integrated nipple and vent system means no extra parts to clean or lose. These soft silicone nipples rapidly vent, directing air bubbles into the bottle, not baby's tummy, which significantly reduces gas, colic, and fussiness. To help take the guesswork out of feeding your little one the Vented + Polypropylene Bottles feature molded measurement markers in both ounces and milliliters to provide an easy and accurate way to measure the volume of liquids without the risk of the measurements washing off. The unique shape, based on Evenflo's flagship design with a lightweight yet ergonomic twist, helps to make these bottles simple to hold, simple to use and simple to love. An added bonus is that these standard neck bottles fit many standard neck breast pumps so you can easily pump directly into the bottle for added convenience. Rest assured, our bottles are 100% free of polycarbonates, PVC and phthalates, and are also made of food grade material.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Easy to Hold The unique twist shaped bottle is lightweight and easy to hold during feeding. The Nipple The included Evenflo Feeding Vented + Slow Flow Nipple is 100% silicone and features an integrated 1-piece venting system to help reduce the potential for colic, reflux, gas, and fussiness. Vented + Nipples are available in the following flows: Slow, Medium* and Fast*. *Sold separately Easy to Clean Dishwasher safe (top rack only) for convenient and quick cleaning. Pump Compatibility Compatible with all Evenflo Feeding breast pumps and most other standard neck breast pump brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 2, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I thought I needed to buy some fancy bottles with all the extra pieces that somehow “make it better and more advanced”, and they ended up leaking after 4 weeks (Dr. Brown’s is one example), not to mention a pain in the butt to clean. But then I found these and figured I’d give them a shot because they were low priced and I was tired of spending a ton of money on brands that didn’t work. Best bottle we’ve tried. They don’t “look fancy”, but we haven’t had a leak, they’re easy, simple, and the nipples they have are perfect for preventing any gas/colic without all those extra pieces. So easy to clean.The ONLY problem I have is that it’s pretty hard to see the measurement of ounces on the side of the bottles... especially in the dark. If you have poor vision they probably won’t work out well for you.Pros outweighed the (one) con for us. We even ordered more because I don’t see us needing to, or wanting to try another brand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 28, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly what I was looking for
reviews.reviewText: These bottles are great. I have one of the old school standard neck playtex ventaire bottles before they discontinued and it’s the only bottle that my daughter doesn’t make a complete mess with. I searched for months for something similar. Trying out so many different bottles wasting so much money. She hates the dr browns nipples but so many bottles have that same type of nipple including the eventflo classic. Then there’s all the fancy ones that also worked terrible for her. then I found these by total accident and the nipples are almost identical to the old ventaire bottles and OMG she does so good on them. I’m so happy. They’re easy to clean too. No so many sorts that other venting bottles have. The markings like others have said are a tad hard to see but only if you’re not in a well lit area but they’re not as terrible as people have said. Wish I found these sooner because they’re affordable too. I would’ve saved myself a lot of headache and money. I was bummed at first though that they come with the slow flow nipples since normally when you purchase an 8 oz bottle they come with the medium. However since the way they’re vented they flow like a medium flow nipple. So definitely keep that in mind when purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These bottles turned out great! The only thing I did differently was I bought the DR.Brown nipples size 4 since my baby is 9 months and it fit perfectly!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Love these bottles but the only down fall is that the measurements are super hard to read! It’s almost impossible at night so I have to get bottles ready before bed. Other than that they are amazing and super easy to clean!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lip and tongue tie baby finally has good latch!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve never written a review on Amazon, even though I’ve purchased thousands of goods. But I felt like this could help someone else. My son has a lip and tongue tie and couldn’t latch onto the Dr. Brown narrows despite everyone saying that those were the best I tried seven other bottles and THESE ones finally worked for him!! no leaking at the sides and he’s able to get a Good latch!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to read EASY TO CLEAN/USE
reviews.reviewText: My son loooves dr.brown bottles only issue is has too many pieces it's annoying to clean a 6piece bottle but worst part THEY LEAK I HATE DR.BROWN BOTTLES these were recommended for me and omg I'm sooo grateful for the advice they've made my life sooo much easy I'm definitely placing a 2nd order because these are the best bottles EVER and he doesn't get gas so that's awesome win win we both love em get these bottles for real you won't regret it only down side numbers are so hard to read. But holding up to the light problem solved

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these Evenflo bottles!
reviews.reviewText: Our sweet boy (2 months old now) has tried Dr. Brown, Avent, and NUK bottles, but these are his favorites by far!!!! He is able to make a great "suction" around the nipples and they're easier for him, especially because he started out with feeding issues and wasn't gaining weight very fast. I was debating about getting the glass bottles, but I was glad I just got them in this material because they are so light- weight, easy to grip and they are better suited for when baby begins to hold his own bottle. I had to order the next stage nipples directly from the Evenflo Feeding Store. So, I definitely wish they were more accessible for shoppers; I can only find them on Amazon or Walmart (online).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars They are okay but spend a little more for something better
reviews.reviewText: Simple bottles - hard to read but I personally like that there isn’t any flashy designs. The only con I found with these bottles are the collars. They feel so cheap, don’t screw on right all the time and tend to pop off if you’re not careful. Yes the dr brown bottles are a hassle to clean but if you get the Options version they are a lot better quality and you won’t ever have to deal with a cheap collar ring,

reviews.reviewTitle: Buena calidad para flujo de bebé 0 meses
No cierran bien y causa que se derrame la leche al bebé
reviews.reviewText: Las mamilas no sellan bien , la primera vez que se abrió pensé que yo la había cerrado mal , pero ha pasado más de 4 ocasiones donde se supone está bien cerrada y cuando el bebé está tomando la leche se abre cae sobre el bebé la leche
Bien a secas, se siente algo delgado elPlastico del biberon a diferencia de otros que compre de la misma marca 5oz pero estan bien
